Topbar.freeDelivery: Get free delivery on orders over {value}

loginPage.headline: Welcome back!
loginPage.description: Sign in to manage your orders, save your favorite products, and enjoy a personalized shopping experience.

01.title: Express Checkout
01.description: Save your shipping details and complete your purchase in seconds.

02.title: Wishlist
02.description: Keep track of your favorite items and get notified about price drops.

03.title: Secure Access
03.description: Your data is protected with industry-standard end-to-end encryption.

newsletter.title: Sign up for our newsletter
newsletter.description: The latest news, articles and resources, sent to your inbox weekly.
newsletter.errorSubscribe: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

loyalty.title: Exclusive Benefits
loyalty.description: Already subscribed? Use the code sent to your email to ensure 10% discount on your first purchase. <emphasis>Redeem now</emphasis>

Hero.headline: Focus on what matters
Hero.paragraph: All the charts, datepickers, and notifications in the world can't beat checking off some items on a paper card.
Hero.altImage: Close-up aerial view of an organized person working at a wooden desk, handling note cards in a wooden holder, with a tablet and office accessories nearby.

Sale.headline: Get 25% off during our one-time sale
Sale.paragraph: Most of our products are limited releases that won't come back. Get your favorite items while they're in stock.
Sale.ctaBtn: Get access to our one-time sale

01.quote: My new journal and pens arrived super quickly. The paper quality is even better than I hoped it would be, making my morning writing routine much more inspiring and professional. Very happy customer!
01.author: Sarah Peters, New Orleans

02.quote: I had to exchange a ceramic mug that arrived with a small scratch. The whole customer service process was so simple and friendly that I ended up ordering two more desk organizers for my office.
02.author: Kelly McPherson, Chicago

03.quote: Now that I’m redesigning my home office for the summer, I’ll probably order a few more leather mousepads and notebooks. It’s just so convenient, the minimalist design is perfect, and I know the premium quality will always be there.
03.author: Chris Paul, Phoenix

stock.inStock: In stock and ready to ship

01.title: Worldwide Shipping
01.description: Shipping to over 50 countries with full tracking.

02.title: Secure Payment
02.description: Payments processed via Stripe with 256-bit encryption.

01.quote1: The attention to detail is what sets this apart. From the sustainable packaging to the actual product, you can tell everything was crafted with care.
01.quote2: The quality is outstanding—it looks and feels even more premium in person. I've already recommended the store to several colleagues who value minimalist design.
01.author: Marcus R.

02.emphasis: Perfect balance of form and function
02.quote1: I had a few questions about the materials and customer support was incredibly helpful and fast. Decided to go for it and I couldn't be happier.
02.quote2: Delivery was surprisingly fast. The product has a timeless look that fits perfectly with my lifestyle, whether I'm at the office or traveling. Truly a versatile piece.
02.author: Sarah J.

03.quote1: It's rare to find products these days that actually feel durable. I've been using mine daily for weeks and it still looks brand new.
03.quote2: If you're looking for something that combines durability with a clean, modern aesthetic, this is it. It's definitely worth the investment for the quality you get.
03.author: David K.

ProductsPage.headline: New Arrivals
ProductsPage.paragraph: A curated collection of essentials designed with a focus on functionality and longevity. Minimalist design to elevate your workspace and daily routine.

CartPage.paragraph: Review your selected items before completing your purchase. Quality guaranteed in every detail.

SuccessPage.headline: Thanks for ordering
SuccessPage.paragraph: We appreciate your order, we’re currently processing it. So hang tight and we’ll send you confirmation very soon!

OrderHistory.headline: Order History
OrderHistory.paragraph: Check the status of recent orders, manage returns, and download invoices.

NotFound.title: Page Not Found
NotFound.description: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.

Home.title: Home
